Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
measurement
<testing> The act or process of measuring; a figure, extent, or amount obtained by measuring.
(1996-12-27)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Measurement \Meas"ure*ment\, n. 1. The act or result of measuring; mensuration; as, measurement is required. [1913 Webster]
2. The extent, size, capacity, amount. or quantity ascertained by measuring; as, its measurement is five acres. [1913 Webster]
measurement n : the act or process of measuring; "the measurements were carefully done"; "his mental measurings proved remarkably accurate" [syn: {measuring}, {measure}, {mensuration}]
